message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $18,000.  Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for your offer.  I appreciate your interest.  While I value your business, $12,000 is significantly below my minimum price point. I'm willing to come down to $16,000 to make this work.  Let me know if you're interested.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but unfortunately, I am unable to meet your price of $16,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14,000 for the product.
